meanings.sent1: The cytoskeletal framework provides support to the cell.

meanings.sent3: The cytoskeletal dance of proteins keeps the cell lively.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the cytoskeletal structure of a cell.
meanings.sent5: The cytoskeletal network is like a bustling city within the cell.

meanings.sent3: The cytoskeletal party in the cell never stops!
